message: I am so frustrated with your service!
Thank you for resolving my issue quickly.
This is confusing, I don't understand what to do next.
Everything is working perfectly now!
Why has my ticket not been resolved yet?
The agent was kind but the resolution was unclear.
I'm still waiting for a callback.
Appreciate the fast response.
I’m disappointed with the delay.
Support team was helpful and quick.

Alright. I've been using this for over 3 months and first things first, I was skeptical of the hinge. It is not a problem. If you rough handle a phone, it is bound to get some cracks and problems here and there and so is the case with this. But, if you handle it with care, you won't face this hinge issue. I haven't. The sound quality is good, camera both front and back are good. Camera is good but samsung could do way better. One thing with the back camera is that, it makes the objects look lively, which is ofcourse a good thing. It is a steal deal at just 60K.

Pathetic phone. By the end of 1st year it developed touch screen issue.

Now after 2yr its display has corrupted.

Its a very weak quality phone with very very high repairing cost.

Thank you for reaching out to us with your concerns. I'm so sorry to hear that our product hasn't met your expectations. It's surprising to hear that you're not impressed, as we've worked hard to create a product that would be useful to our customers. I'd like to understand more about what's not meeting your expectations. Can you please tell me more about what you were hoping to achieve with our product, and how it's fallen short? Your feedback is invaluable to us, and I'll do my best to assist you in finding a solution or providing a refund if that's what you'd prefer.
This product is very amazing and very useful. Value for money

Thank you so much for taking the time to share your wonderful experience with our product! It's absolutely delightful to hear that you're thoroughly enjoying its amazing features and finding it to be a great value for your money. We're thrilled to know that we've been able to bring a smile to your face!

We're committed to providing the best possible products and services, so your joy is music to our ears! If you have any questions or need any further assistance, please don't hesitate to reach out. We're always here to help.

Once again, thank you for your kind words, and we're glad you're loving your purchase!
